DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine 6-month survival rate patient metastatic recurrent carcinoma esophagus gastroesophageal junction treat gemcitabine irinotecan . - Determine qualitative quantitative toxic effect regimen patient . OUTLINE : Patients receive gemcitabine IV 30 minute irinotecan IV 90 minute day 1 8 . Treatment repeat every 21 day least 6 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow every 3 month 1 year every 6 month 2 year . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 30-55 patient accrue study .
